description:
MAD TRIGGER CREW and Fling Posse learn that there are clues about TBH in Osaka. They ask Dotsuitare Honpo for help and start gathering information. A crew of three imitating Fling Posse appears. Something about seeing a copy of himself irritates Ramuda.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Friendship Is a Single Soul Dwelling in Three Bodies.
Friendship Is a Single Soul Dwelling in Three Bodies.
Friendship is a single soul dwelling in three bodies.
